attributes.action: Stop lorrys overtaking on dual carriage ways during peak hours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In much of Europe vehicals over 3.5t can not overtake during peak times (8am until 6pm) since   All vehicals over 3.5t have been resticted to 56mph you have increased dramatically the volume of traffic all doing the same speed. On roads like the A34 it can often take over 10 miles for lorries to over take.
